name: The Crazy Life Of Obi
description:
Obi is constantly on the run because of his mishaps.

Come back from a wacky arcade game and help Obi get out of the most demanding situations.

A 100% PARISIAN ATYPICAL ARCADE GAME!
- An ideal mix between a survival, arcade and platform game.
- Graphics made of paper to be in
- Stress and adrenaline.

BE PART OF THE CREATION OF THIS LOUFOQUE PARISIAN UNIVERSE!
-With the community section found in the game that will redirect you to social networks, you will have the possibility of proposing the most wacky ideas of scenario or addition of gameplay that you want to see in this arcade game.

Regular game updates to have endless levels of fun.

Game available in: English, French, other languages will be available in future updates.

Let's go for adventure.
